member.name: RPCOLEMESSAGE
member.summary: Contains marshaling invocation arguments and return values between COM components.

member.name: RPCOLEMESSAGE.dataRepresentation
member.summary: The data representation with which the data was marshaled.

member.name: RPCOLEMESSAGE.cbBuffer
member.summary: The size of the buffer, in bytes.

member.name: RPCOLEMESSAGE.iMethod
member.summary: The number of the method to be invoked.

member.name: RPCOLEMESSAGE.rpcFlags
member.summary: Status flags for the RPC connection.
